Text: The same thing that happened to me with "TTC - History of the United States (2nd Edition)"; here the page shows no seeds, but in utorrent it has 2 seeds and 10 leechers.

The guidebook included is called "Argumentation, Study of Effective Reasoning 1 (chaps. 01-12).pdf", but actually is the guidebook of both parts; from pages 01 to 54 covers the first part, and the second guidebook (chaps. 13-24) starts at page 55.
